extendedInfo.description: It may be Best Game Ever about the crew behind the Best Song Ever!Enjoy this FREE, FUN, and ADDICTING FAST-PACED game, where you have to swipe as many of the Harrys as you can, but avoid the bombs!FEATURES:+ Behind-the-scenes photos from One Direction!+ Fast-paced gameplay!+ 100% Free!+ Easy to play!LEGAL NOTICE:This is an unofficial One Direction app and the purpose of this app is for entertainment only. This application complies with US Copyright law guidelines of "fair use". All images in this app are licensed under "Creative Commons" as provided by Wikimedia Commons.
